title: Me2e definition of stubs
description: Stub definition for the Me2e Library.

name.description: Optional identifier of this stub. Needs to be unique for one Mock Server.

request.description: Definition of the request to which the stub should respond.

path.description: URL path of the request. Note that the actual path always contains a leading slash, e.g. `/search`.

headers.description: Headers of the request as map of header name and string matcher.

query-parameters.description: Query parameters of the request as map of query parameter name and string matcher for the values.

body-patterns.description: Patterns to match the request body.

response.description: Definition of the response to be returned by the mocked web server.

response-body.description: Definition of the response body. Note that only one of the fields can be specified.

string-content.description: Literal text content of the response body.

json-content.description: JSON content of the response body as a dictionary or a list of dictionaries.

base64-content.description: Binary content of the response body encoded as Base 64.

body-pattern.description: Pattern to match a request body

string-matcher.description: Pattern to match strings. Only matches if actual value conforms to all specified requirements.

equals.description: Matches only if the string is exactly equal to the defined one.

not-equals.description: Matches only if the string is not exactly equal to the defined one.

matches.description: Matches if the string conforms to the defined regex pattern. Note that you need to escape special characters with double backslashes, e.g. `\/account\/(.*)\/authorize`.

not-matches.description: Matches if the string does not conform to the defined regex pattern. Note that you need to escape special characters with double backslashes, e.g. `\/account\/(.*)\/authorize`.

contains.description: Matches if the string contains the defined one.

not-contains.description: Matches if the string does not contain the defined one.

ignore-case.description: Whether to disable case sensitivity for the string matching.
